item.title: From Jackson Hole: Yellowstone Old Faithful, Waterfalls and Wildlife Day Tour
item.description: Enjoy a full-day exploring Yellowstone National Park on a small-group guided tour from the comfort of an enclosed, air-conditioned vehicle. Stops include Old Faithful, the Lower Falls of Grand Canyon of Yellowstone, and several opportunities to observe the diverse wildlife of these national parks. Riding along with a naturalist guide, you’ll spend the morning searching for bears, wolves, elk, moose, and bison, and continue the tour at famous Yellowstone landmarks. Your professional guide will explain the park's history, ecology and geology throughout the day. Since this small group tour has an 11-person maximum, you’re ensured a personalized Yellowstone experience.

image.alt: From Jackson Hole: Yellowstone Old Faithful, Waterfalls and Wildlife Day Tour

item.title: Grand Teton Wildlife Safari in a Enclosed or Open-Air Vehicle (season dependent)
item.description: On this small-group Grand Teton wildlife safari, join a local naturalist and guide for a ride in an open-air safari vehicle (seasonal) on dirt roads and on paved highways within Grand Teton National Park, where you scour the landscape at dawn or dusk for wolves, moose, and elk. Look for eagles soaring overhead or deer walking through the woods, and there’s even the chance you could spot a bear roaming near the road. In addition to helping find wildlife, your guide discusses the area’s ecology, history, geology, and culture, and also stops so you can take photos of the landscape, wildlife, or terrain.

image.alt: Grand Teton Wildlife Safari in a Enclosed or Open-Air Vehicle (season dependent)

item.title: Scenic Wildlife Float in Jackson Hole
item.description: On this relaxing rafting trip from Jackson Hole, drift down a scenic section of Wyoming’s wildlife-laden Snake River, where moose, deer, river otters and eagles can all be seen from your raft. Be sure to bring your camera to photograph any wildlife that appears on the banks, and also capture the stunning landscape extending out from the Tetons.

image.alt: Scenic Wildlife Float in Jackson Hole

item.title: Whitewater Rafting in Jackson Hole : Family Standard Raft
item.description: Experience the exhilaration of whitewater rafting on Wyoming's scenic rapids with our standard raft option. Perfect for larger families or those seeking stability, you'll tackle thrilling Class II and III rapids like the Big Kahuna and Lunch Counter. Paddle along an 8-mile (13-kilometer) stretch that boasts limestone cliffs, Lodgepole Pine hills, and the majestic Grey’s National Forest backdrop.

image.alt: Whitewater Rafting in Jackson Hole : Family Standard Raft

item.title: Sunrise 4-Hour Grand Teton Wildlife Adventure
item.description: See Grand Teton National Park in the brilliant early morning hours on a half-day sunrise tour. Get inside the park early before the crowds arrive, and watch the first rays of light wash over mountain peaks, lakes, and forests. Travel the backroads of Jackson Hole during the summer, and head to insider locations for the best views and chances of seeing wildlife like bears, bald eagles, elk, and bison.

image.alt: Sunrise 4-Hour Grand Teton Wildlife Adventure

item.title: Grand Teton Half Day Tour
item.description: Explore the highlights of Grand Teton National Park on a half-day tour from Jackson or Teton Village. Travel along the Gros Ventre River to the Mormon Row Historic District, Moose Junction, and other places where wildlife roam. Use the provided spotting scope and field glasses to get a close look at animals like moose, elk, and eagles, and learn about Wyoming’s wildlife and history. Choose from a morning or afternoon departure for your tour led by an naturalist guide, or upgrade to make yours a private tour.

image.alt: Grand Teton Half Day Tour

item.title: Sunset 4-Hour Grand Teton Wildlife Adventure
item.description: Grand Teton National Park offers some of America’s most spectacular wildlife, including grizzlies, wolves, elk, moose, bison, antelope, bighorn sheep, and bald eagles. Beat the crowds and enjoy 360-degree viewing on this small-group tour with a naturalist wildlife guide in a custom vehicle with a roof hatch and a window for everyone. Swarovski scopes and binoculars ensure great visibility, with iPads to help you learn more about what you’re viewing.

image.alt: Sunset 4-Hour Grand Teton Wildlife Adventure

item.title: Snake River Scenic Float Trip with Teton Views in Jackson Hole
item.description: Stunning scenery, wildlife sightings, and a different side of the Yellowstone ecosystem await you on this scenic floating tour down the Snake River from Jackson Hole, Wyoming. Join a professional river guide who will provide all steering and propulsion for your 13-mile rafting trip so you can sit back and enjoy the views. This tour is ideal for those who have never been rafting or who prefer to avoid the rigor of other rafting trips, including families and senior citizens.

image.alt: Snake River Scenic Float Trip with Teton Views in Jackson Hole

item.title: Yellowstone Lower Loop Full-Day Tour
item.description: Tour the lower loop of Yellowstone National Park with an expert guide on this all-day tour. Visit popular sites like Old Faithful, Grand Prismatic Spring, Lake Yellowstone, and more. Stop for an included lunch and many photo ops throughout the day. As you travel through the park, keep your eyes open for bears, elk, and bison that are commonly spotted in the area.

image.alt: Yellowstone Lower Loop Full-Day Tour

item.title: Private Yellowstone Tour: ICONIC Sites, Wildlife, Family Friendly Hikes + lunch
item.description: Avoid crowds and maximize your wildlife-viewing experience on this private Yellowstone tour led by a naturalist guide. Journey through Yellowstone National Park while making frequent stops for wildlife encounters as well as scenic and secluded hikes that lead to some of Yellowstone's best destinations and lesser-known geysers and hot springs that lie off the beaten path.

image.alt: Private Yellowstone Tour: ICONIC Sites, Wildlife, Family Friendly Hikes + lunch

item.title: Yellowstone National Park - Full-Day Lower Loop Tour from Jackson
item.description: See some of the top landmarks and highlights of Yellowstone National Park during this full-day tour from Jackson Hole. Spot local wildlife such as grizzly bears, bison, elk, moose, eagles, and wolves with the provided binoculars. Visit attractions such as the Grand Canyon of Yellowstone waterfalls, Hayden Valley, and Old Faithful. Park entry fees, breakfast, lunch, and round-trip transportation from Jackson Hole are included.

image.alt: Yellowstone National Park - Full-Day Lower Loop Tour from Jackson

item.title: Whitewater Rafting in Jackson Hole: Small Boat Excitement
item.description: Enjoy an adventure on the Snake River with a whitewater-rafting trip from Jackson. You'll travel down the river on an 8-man raft, a smaller vessel than other river rafts, meaning you'll paddle hard and get very wet. During the 8-mile (12.8-km) journey, navigate the river's famous rapids such as Big Kahuna and Lunch Counter.

image.alt: Whitewater Rafting in Jackson Hole: Small Boat Excitement

item.title: Grand Canyon of the Yellowstone Rim and Loop Hike with Lunch
item.description: Embark on one of the best hikes in Yellowstone National Park in the company of a guide who knows the area well. The Grand Canyon Rim trail takes you through the forest out to Ribbon Lake, and then past a geyser basin, Clear Lake, and the Wapiti Meadows for excellent views of the Hayden Valley. Lunch, snacks, and gear are provided.

image.alt: Grand Canyon of the Yellowstone Rim and Loop Hike with Lunch

item.title: Jackson Hole Whitewater Rafting Classic from Jackson Hole,Wyoming
item.description: Hold on for a wild ride down 8 miles (13 km) of the Snake River during this river rafting excursion. Paddle through Class III rapids as you paddle alongside your expert river guide. The journey takes you down whitewater sections followed by calm waters. Navigate through beautiful scenery along the river and enjoy an experience suitable for families.

image.alt: Jackson Hole Whitewater Rafting Classic from Jackson Hole,Wyoming

item.title: Half-Day Wildlife Safari Tour in Grand Teton National Park
item.description: This half-day wildlife viewing tour takes in the splendor of the National Elk Refuge and Grand Teton National Park. Travel into the great American outdoors with an interpretive guide who shares insightful commentary on the region’s natural and cultural history. Cast your lens on herds of bison, pronghorn, elk and more. Hotel pickup and drop-off from central Jackson Hole is included.

image.alt: Half-Day Wildlife Safari Tour in Grand Teton National Park

item.title: Snake River Scenic Float
item.description: If you think floating down the Snake is only for the outdoorsy, think again. With this tour, you’ll ride a raft with high-back seats, making this ultra-scenic journey great for young and old. A stable ride across a gentle current lets you relax in the open air, catching some of Jackson Hole’s best views—and possibly even eagles, elk, moose, bears, and more.

image.alt: Snake River Scenic Float

item.title: Lower Loop Van Tour from West Yellowstone: Grand Prismatic and Old Faithful
item.description: Explore Yellowstone's famous Lower Loop the easy way on a small-group van tour that takes you to highlights like the Old Faithful geyser, Shadow Canyon, Yellowstone Lake, and the Grand Prismatic Hot Springs. Leave the driving to a professional and ride with a small group of fellow travelers, stopping along the way for short hikes, wildlife watching, and to admire the best scenic overlooks.

image.alt: Lower Loop Van Tour from West Yellowstone: Grand Prismatic and Old Faithful

item.title: Kayak Day Paddle on Yellowstone Lake
item.description: Explore the rocky shores and tranquil waters of Yellowstone Lake on a half-day kayak tour with a professional guide. Climb into either a single or double kayak and then set out to discover the beauty of Yellowstone Lake at a relaxed pace. Paddle beside the West Thumb Geyser Basin to see incredible geothermic features, and appease your appetite with a delicious picnic lunch. No previous kayaking experience is necessary.

image.alt: Kayak Day Paddle on Yellowstone Lake

item.title: Grand Teton and National Elk Refuge Winter Wonderland Full Day Adventure
item.description: There’s a special beauty to Grand Teton National Park in the snowy silence of winter, free of the summertime crowds. On this Grand Teton day trip from Jackson Hole, a guide helps you search for bison and bighorn sheep, and you could also see moose, coyotes, eagles, or even wolves. In addition, visit the National Elk Refuge, where you ride past herds of powerful elk on a comfortable, horse-drawn sleigh.

image.alt: Grand Teton and National Elk Refuge Winter Wonderland Full Day Adventure

item.title: Yellowstone Old Faithful Full-Day Snowmobile Tour from Jackson Hole
item.description: Experience winter in Yellowstone National Park on a full-day snowmobile tour from Jackson Hole. You'll cover about 90 miles (145km) on your round-trip journey by snowmobile, and have the chance to see the Old Faithful geyser and other geothermal wonders, native wildlife of Wyoming, vast tracts of snow-covered forest, and landmarks like Moose Falls, West Thumb geyser basin, and Fountain Paint Pots. Includes hot breakfast, lunch, snowmobiling gear and guide, and hotel pickup and drop-off from Jackson Hole and Teton Village.

image.alt: Yellowstone Old Faithful Full-Day Snowmobile Tour from Jackson Hole

item.title: Yellowstone and Grand Teton 4 Day 3 Night Wildlife Adventure
item.description: Researching the perfect Yellowstone itinerary can be a bit overwhelming, and sometimes it’s best to allow the pros to piece together the trip. On this exceptional 4-day tour of Grand Teton and Yellowstone national parks, your guide does that for you. Experience the park’s best sights like Old Faithful and spot a wide range of wildlife at times when they are out on the move.

image.alt: Yellowstone and Grand Teton 4 Day 3 Night Wildlife Adventure

item.title: Cody Trolley Tours - Best of the West Trolley Tour
item.description: Discover the best of Cody, Wyoming on a historic trolley tour through town. Cruise around town and see several key landmarks including the dam, Old Trail Town, the Cody Mural and Museum, and the rodeo. While you drive, your guide regales you of the history of the town including stories of the famous American soldier, Buffalo Bill, who founded Cody.

image.alt: Cody Trolley Tours - Best of the West Trolley Tour

item.title: Yellowstone National Park Tour from Jackson Hole
item.description: Discover the highlights of Yellowstone National Park with ease on this full-day tour from Jackson Hole. Get epic views of geysers, canyons, waterfalls, rivers, and wildlife, and see Yellowstone highlights like Old Faithful and the Grand Canyon of the Yellowstone. Learn the area’s volcanic geology and unique level of ecology, and keep your eyes peeled for Yellowstone wildlife — including bison and wolves. Entrance fees extra.

image.alt: Yellowstone National Park Tour from Jackson Hole

item.title: Whitewater Rafting Jackson Hole Family Friendly Classic Raft
item.description: Enjoy a classic whitewater-rafting adventure on the Snake River, where you'll travel eight miles (13 km) on a 17-foot (5-meter) self-bailing raft, designed to handle the river rapids. With a guide providing instruction, you'll tackle Class II and III rapids such as Champagne, Big Kahuna, Lunch Counter, and Ropes during the journey from West Table to Sheep Gulch in Snake River Canyon. Calm stretches with chances for swimming allow you to relax between the action.

image.alt: Whitewater Rafting Jackson Hole Family Friendly Classic Raft
